system.description: “Being off the grid never felt so literal.” Spend 1 Hope to temporarily erase your digital and heat signatures. Until the end of the Scene, you cannot be tracked by sensors or cameras, and Devices or enemies targeting you have a -2 to hit.
system.effect: Spend 1 Hope to temporarily erase your digital and heat signatures. Until the end of the Scene, you cannot be tracked by sensors or cameras, and Devices or enemies targeting you have a -2 to hit.
system.blurb: “Being off the grid never felt so literal.”
